titles.title: A resolution recognizing the efforts and accomplishments of the GOD'S CHILD Project and congratulating the GOD'S CHILD Project on its 20th anniversary.
A resolution recognizing the efforts and accomplishments of the GOD'S CHILD Project and congratulating the GOD'S CHILD Project on its 20th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Congratulates the GOD'S CHILD Project on its 20th anniversary and commends the Project for its charitable service to the poor.
Recognizes those individuals who have served impoverished children and women throughout the world under the Project's auspices, including Project volunteers and staff.
